.. ml_drought documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Jul 22 15:49:01 2019.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to ml_drought's documentation!
======================================

This is an `ECMWF Summer of Weather Code <https://www.ecmwf.int/en/learning/workshops/ecmwf-summer-weather-code-2019>`_
project to use machine learning to better predict and understand drought.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :numbered:
    :caption: Quickstart

    quickstart/overview
    quickstart/data
    quickstart/engineering
    quickstart/modelling

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :numbered:
    :caption: API Documentation

    source/src.exporters
    source/src.preprocess
    source/src.engineer
    source/src.models
